name: paradoxical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 seeming impossible or difficult to understand because of containing two opposite facts or characteristics: It seems paradoxical to me, but if you drink a cup of hot tea it seems to cool you down. I was in a very difficult and paradoxical situation. See
paradox
More examplesFewer examplesThis controversy itself reflects the paradoxical nature of the global economy.The president has made seemingly paradoxical statements on the issue.Their response may seem paradoxical.
